post:
Today I'm proud to announce the launch of Stillery!

We're starting off with our Sigma service, a VPS provider with a focus on performance. And, as with all Stillery services, our plan is to be **fully transparent** about what we offer.

---

With our Plan 1 at **$7/month**, you get:

- 1/2 thread (shared with one other VPS, but burstable up to 1 thread)
    - E3-1270v3 @ 3.5GHz (turbo up to 3.9GHz)
- 1GB ECC RAM
- 15GB pure SSD RAID10 storage
- 1TB @ 1Gbps bandwidth
    - QuickPacket in Los Angeles, CA
        - [AS46261](http://bgp.he.net/AS46261)
        - [Looking glass](http://lg.lax.quickpacket.com/)
    - 1 IPv4, IPv6 support (more available upon request)
- KVM virtualization with fully custom management panel

[**Sign up here!**](https://sigma.stillery.co)

We also have some higher-end plans with dedicated threads on our website.

---

Because we oversell absolutely nothing, we can only fit *at most* 16 nodes per host! In this case, stock is limited to this as well.

A warning that we do not guarantee support response times (though we do try to be quick & friendly!), and **all VMs are manually approved and created**. Be patient as it may take up to 24-48 hours.

Finally: **we're human too**! So if you have *any* questions, comments, or issues, do *not* hesitate to email us at [support@stillery.co](mailto:support@stillery.co). Or, PM me here if that's what you prefer.
